stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: To explain why students have trouble w/the class, she says frequently that this is tough material to learn, but really it\'s because her lectures are cluttered and she doesn\'t explain the basics. I got a good grade 1/2 bc I follow a lot of social justice blogs on tumblr and 1/2 bc I\'m good at BSing. Great subject and instructor, poor execution

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is very passionate about what she teaches and the lectures show her excitement. No computers allowed in her lectures unless you sit in the front. Take the class with friends so you can share notes on the reading. If I did not have a good TA I would not be doing well it he class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: She teaches the class as if we were all grad students, and WE ARE NOT! She assigns a ridiculous amount of reading, and she moves quickly. Each lecture is pretty random--no common thread or logical class format at all. She\'s incredibly smart but not good at teaching undergrads. Thank god my TA is awesome.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: GREAT!!! Lots of Reading but AMAZING teacher!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She assigns so much reading that it is impossible to keep up. It seems like she doesn\'t realize students have other classes too. There are A LOT of readings every single day. In half a week, she assigned an entire novel to be read. In class she moves much too quickly for students to keep up. Very, very boring class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Gomez-Barris has very strict and narrow ideas about what is valid and what is not good work and scholarship, and sad to say, this view appears to be affected by the race and gender of her students. If you line up directly with her interests, great. If not, run like the wind. She seems benevolent and interested in her students, but she is not.
